page.title: 04Shopping in Beccles.
page.content: Beccles is a small market town.There are many small shops of different kinds-food shops,furniture shops,chemists,baker's shops,clothes shops and two supermarkets. The main shopping area comprises New Market,The Walk,Exchange Square and the Â£Gates'-Sheepgate,Blyburgate,Small- gate and Hungate. Some Beccles people shop in Lowestoft ,Gt.Yarmouth or Norwich as they cannot get everything they need in the town shops and there is a bigger choice in the larger towns. Nevertheless, most people in Beccles find that they can do all of their normal,everyday shopping in Beccles.
